explanation: The majority of recent live chat opinions referencing BTC suggest a bullish outlook or expectation of price increases, such as references to 'subway pump,' 'going north,' and targets above 108-109k. Multiple users refer to strong support at 107k and expectations of a move to liquidate shorts above 109k. There are, however, a few bearish comments (e.g., head and shoulders, short to 107k), but the prevailing sentiment is upward with some neutral caution about stop losses.
representative_opinions: wrong way bitty, you must go north. thats where the love is.
so close to next leg up
Tiger Eye: Trend line is holding up quite good, if we slip 107 is a strong support
Alexis Gonzalez: 109700 is the last of liquidations above us and with this price action it looks quite possible. I bet we go up at least to liquid levels before we see 103500 again
